# Forced Incorporeality (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Ectomancy Spells|ectomancy]]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 6]], [[BoXM 6th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Target:** One ghost or naturally incorporeal undead

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Ghostwalk (WotC), pg. 52

The target ghost is enveloped in an orange haze that forces it to be incorporeal for the duration of the spell.

*Forced incorporeality* counters and dispels *[[Forced Manifestation (Spell)|forced manifestation]]**.*
